text:
="preserve">Atilio Ángel Pozzobón (24 March 1938 – 12 September 2020) was an Argentine actor. He was born in Buenos Aires. He was known for his roles as Francesco in "Son of the Bride" (2001), as Saligani in "Lost Embrace" (2004) and as the movie Czar in "Ay Juancito" (2004).
Pozzobón died on 12 September 2020 in Buenos Aires at the age of 82.
